name: Tours Management
desc: Discover and book amazing tours with ToursManagement: your go-to platform for unforgettable travel experiences and seamless bookings.

name: Budgety
desc: Budgety web app is a utility single page web app that helps you calculate and visualize your budget.

name: Brain x Tumor
desc: Streamlit app allowing you to upload an MRI image and predict if there's a brain tumor or not using a trained Keras model.

name: Disease-Prediction-Online
desc: This app will analyze your disease symptoms and predict using Machine Learning on the web.
